name: Curse Knight
description:
Welcome to Curse Knight! I made this game there in 2019, but I forgot about it and only remembered now. So I gave it a little polish and I believe it is now good enough for you to play it.

In each playthrough you need to survive, so you must kill all the enemies and bosses. How? Using your axe, of course! Pressing space will throw you in the direction of the last arrow key you pressed. Watch out! After throwing your axe, you'll have to find it again, or else you won't be able to attack anymore!

Each monster can drop a loot or a helmet that will make it invincible for a while. The game is divided into four waves, each wave with a boss at the end. The boss appears after you kill a multiple of 30 enemies (30,60,90,120).

The game has two bosses, one being a giant one-eyed beholder and the other a horned cultist. to kill the cultist, you'll need to find a way to destroy the torches he summons. to kill the beholder.. you will find out!

After killing four bosses the win fanfare will play; you won the game! Actually, you didn't. You still can play until you reach the highest score, which is saved in the game files.

That's it! The game is very short, but i find it quite cool. Hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Space - Throw the axe
  • F1 - Switch fullscreen
  • F2 - Restart game
